description:
The Lake Louise & Yoho Map is meticulously designed for outdoor enthusiasts on a quest to explore one of North America's most esteemed day hiking destinations. Whether you're just embarking on your hiking journey or possess a wealth of backcountry experience, this waterproof and tear-resistant map is an indispensable tool for your expedition.

Immerse yourself in captivating photos and detailed descriptions of 11 carefully chosen day hikes, ranging from serene lakeside walks to more demanding alpine adventures. Additionally, gain access to valuable insights into four overnight or multi-day excursions, complete with essential trip planning information to ensure your safety and enjoyment.
name: Gem Trek Publishing Lake Louise  & Yoho Map 11th edition
